mapper.insert: insert into board_attach(post_seq, file_path, file_size, file_name, file_uuid, file_type, regr_seq, first_insert_dt, updr_seq, last_update_dt ) values(#{postSeq}, #{filePath}, #{fileSize}, #{fileName}, #{fileUuid}, #{fileType}, #{regrSeq}, sysdate, 0, sysdate )
mapper.select: select post_seq, file_path, file_size, file_name, file_uuid, file_type, regr_seq, first_insert_dt, updr_seq, last_update_dt from board_attach where post_seq = #{postSeq}
